markdown.markdown:
Pooja S Sukhdeve

Computer Science Graduate Student · Data Scientist · Developer

About Me

Hi, I’m Pooja Sukhdeve — a passionate Computer Science graduate student at Boston University, with 5+ years of hands-on experience in software development, web development, and data analytics. I specialize in building scalable, accessible, and user-centric solutions. I’m proficient in Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, and I’m skilled at transforming complex data into actionable insights using visualization tools like Tableau and SHAP.

My journey includes developing accessible learning modules for visually impaired users, leading award-winning hackathon teams, and contributing to both academic research and innovative industry projects. I love collaborating across disciplines to solve real-world problems with code and data.

About Me

Hi, I’m Pooja Sukhdeve — a passionate Computer Science graduate student at Boston University, with 5+ years of hands-on experience in software development, web development, and data analytics. I specialize in building scalable, accessible, and user-centric solutions. I’m proficient in Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, and I’m skilled at transforming complex data into actionable insights using visualization tools like Tableau and SHAP.

My journey includes developing accessible learning modules for visually impaired users, leading award-winning hackathon teams, and contributing to both academic research and innovative industry projects. I love collaborating across disciplines to solve real-world problems with code and data.

::: {.card-group} ::: {.card} ![](Images/1.png){.card-img-top style="height:90px;width:90px;object-fit:cover;border-radius:50%;margin:auto;margin-top:18px;box-shadow:0 2px 12px #0001;display:block;background:#f7f7fa;"} ## Data Analytics & Visualization Unlock actionable insights from complex data. - Data wrangling & cleaning - Predictive modeling - Dashboards & visualization ::: ::: {.card} ![](Images/3.png){.card-img-top style="height:90px;width:90px;object-fit:cover;border-radius:50%;margin:auto;margin-top:18px;box-shadow:0 2px 12px #0001;display:block;background:#f7f7fa;"} ## Software & Web Development Robust web & backend solutions - Full-stack dev - Responsive UI/UX - API integration ::: ::: {.card} ![](Images/4.png){.card-img-top style="height:90px;width:90px;object-fit:cover;border-radius:50%;margin:auto;margin-top:18px;box-shadow:0 2px 12px #0001;display:block;background:#f7f7fa;"} ## Accessibility & Inclusive Design Software Engineering - WCAG compliance - Custom inclusive tools - Accessibility consultation ::: ::: ## Selected projects in data science, machine learning and NLP --- ### Exoplanet Data Analysis with SHAP Leveraged machine learning (Random Forest, Gradient Boosting) to analyze exoplanet datasets. Achieved 75% model accuracy and used SHAP for interpretable AI, revealing the key features behind exoplanet detection. **Impact:** Balanced accuracy with interpretability to support scientific discovery. Python Jupyter Pandas scikit-learn SHAP
--- ### BRFSS Health Data Analytics Analyzed Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS) data to predict disease risk and optimize health insurance strategies. Employed models like Random Forest and KNN (best accuracy: 84.3%) and used SHAP values for model transparency. **Impact:** Provided actionable health risk insights to support healthcare decision-making. ![**Figure 1:** Footfall at pharmacies and grocery stores, for selected countries](Images/panic-buying-figure1.png) ![**Figure 2:** Timeline of 'Stay At Home' restrictions, by country](Images/exoplanet.png) Python Jupyter Pandas scikit-learn SHAP
--- ### Netflix Data Visualization Dashboard Built a Tableau dashboard visualizing Netflix’s global content, genre trends, and maturity ratings. Highlighted U.S. dominance, movie-to-series ratio, and the evolution of content diversity since 2015. **Impact:** Enabled data-driven understanding of streaming content trends for business and consumers. Tableau Python Pandas
--- ### Visualization Module for Python (Research Project) Developed an interactive visualization tool to help visually impaired users understand data structures like lists and sets in Python. This tool is part of a larger inclusive Python book project. **Impact:** Advanced accessibility in programming education. Python Jupyter HTML5

Technical Skills

  • Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS, Java, PHP
  • Web Development: Node.js, React, Angular, jQuery, Bootstrap, API Integration, Git, Responsive Design
  • Data Visualization & Analytics: Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Pandas, NumPy, SHAP, Excel
  • Data Engineering & Tools: OpenCV, Spark Apache, AWS
  • Other Tools: GitHub, Outlook, Android SDK

Contact Me

Interested in collaborating or want to connect?
Feel free to reach out by email or connect on LinkedIn!

  • Email: poojasukhdeve06@gmail.com
  • GitHub: Your GitHub
  • LinkedIn: Your LinkedIn
